Our favorite meal in Spain!  We dropped by for dinner without a reservation as it was early (relatively) in the night and were seated immediately.  The food was delicious with well-balanced flavors and great attention to detail in the presentation.  No English menu but both waiters / bartenders spoke English quite well so that wasn't a problem.  Perhaps most importantly, their effusive passion for the food enhanced our experience even more!  They took the time to explain the entire menu, pointed out locally sourced ingredients and the heritage behind some dishes, and were very attentive to make sure we enjoyed everything.  La Pubilla and its owners are definitely on the rise!
